simplesect.title: Introduction
simplesect.para: &pl.h; is a free/open source software (FOSS) system developed originally at the &isi.h; (&isi.abv;) of the &usc.h; (&usc.abv;).

This project represents a fork of &pl.h;, developed independent of the original &pl.h;. As an independent initiative, this is motivated principally for a purpose of facilitating the ongoing development of &pl.h;, furthermore for ensuring the continued availability of &pl.h; for free/open source software (FOSS) development.

simplesect.title: Components
simplesect.para:
The version 4 releases of &pl.h; are distributed with software components including:
The &stella.h; programming language, in functional subset and knowledge representation subset, with source code for implementation of &stella.h; and the &pl.h; knowledge representation system in Common Lisp, C++, and Java® programming languages
&pl.h; System Support Components, such as for the &pl.h; server, RDBMS services for &pl.h;, and Ontosaurus
Text of Example Knowledgebases
Documentation
